content: outersleeve stitch left 10 stitches of the jacket slip the last stitch of the right outersleeve as if to leave the rest of the sleeve stitches on the knit onto the right needle holder/cable for now then slip it onto the left needle in front of the then k3 k2tog k2 x 2 k2 k2tog x 2 k3 next stitch of the jacket and knit them together add the right undersleeve in the same manner through the back loops as you added the left undersleeve knitting then k7 of the jacket = 52 sts together 10 stitches from the right undersleeve raising the back… with the next 10 stitches of the jacket 27 k15 k2tog k2 x 4 k2tog k1 w&t… remember to begin with the stitch with the marker leave the rest of the sleeve stitches on the k12 w&t… holder/cable for now k13 k2tog k2 w&t… then k7 of the jacket = 52 sts k20 w&t… you are now at the end of the row k33 46 sts you are now at the end of the row 28 k 29 buttonhole row k2 yo k2tog knit to end 11 inquiries contact rainebodesigns@yahoo com like rainebo designs on facebook http //www facebook com/rainebo-designs-1732403310368724/ ©2022 lorraine pistorio this pattern is not to be sold or given for free to others if you use this pattern to make items for commercial use please give me credit for the pattern please feel free to sell any completed items made from my designed pattern or donate any completed items to charity do not copy reproduce sell and/or distribute this pattern in any form this design and material are copyrighted and protected by federal copyright infringement knit cuddly critters designed by lorraine pistorio thank you for purchasing my cuddly critters pattern i hope you enjoy creating your own cuddly critter 30-31 k jacket body continuing on to the collar… leaving long tail and working flat cast on 128 sts… 32 sl1 k2tog knit till 3 sts remain k2tog k1 = 44 sts row 1-3 k 33 sl1 purl to end 4 k2tog across = 64 sts 34 sl1 k3 m1 k4 x 9 m1 k4 = 54 sts 5-13 k 35-38 sl1 knit to end 14 k2 k2tog k2 x 4 k28 k2 k2tog x 4 k2 = 56 sts bind off loosely binding off the last two stitches 15-23 k together adding the undersleeves… sew on button 24 k7 then… starting with the left sleeve… with the undersleeve facing the outside of the jacket place the stitch with the marker next to the first stitch of the jacket on the left needle you will be working counter-clockwise on the sleeve remove the stitch marker line up the stitches of the undersleeve across from the stitches on the left needle style #3… insert the right needle into the first stitch of the sleeves make 2 undersleeve as if to knit and then into the first leaving long tail cast on 40 sts stitch on
